attributes.additional_details:
Bring back National Service, National service units would be different Battalions to those where regular service personnel work. Anyone under the age of 30 must do two years National service.

This would include migrants coming to live in this country or work including EU countries.

National service should be for men and women. Women will not be exempt if they have children, as childcare would be provided whilst they are on duty or overseas on active service.
